levelUp.selectMaterialHint: Select material to evolve, or cancel
levelUp.selectAsMain: Select as main weapon for evolution
levelUp.combineWeapons: Combine weapons to create a powerful evolved weapon

evolution.title: WEAPON EVOLUTION
evolution.instruction: Select MAIN weapon first, then MATERIAL. â˜… = Core (MAIN only, recipe required)

tech.title: TECH TREE
tech.chooseTech: Choose a new tech to unlock:

coreDesc.fire_core: Master of burning damage over time. Enemies ignite and spread flames.
coreDesc.ice_core: Control the battlefield with freezing attacks. Slow and shatter enemies.
coreDesc.lightning_core: Harness electrical power. Attacks chain between enemies.
coreDesc.shadow_core: Strike from darkness. High critical damage and evasion.
coreDesc.blood_core: Drain life from enemies. Sacrifice health for power.
coreDesc.arcane_core: Master of pure magic. Versatile spells and enhanced cooldowns.
coreDesc.nature_core: Harness nature's power. Regenerate and summon plant allies.
coreDesc.steel_core: Become an impenetrable fortress. High armor and damage reflection.
coreDesc.wind_core: Swift as the wind. High movement speed and evasion.
coreDesc.earth_core: Command the earth itself. Powerful area attacks and stuns.
coreDesc.void_core: Tap into the void. Weaken enemies with curses and debuffs.
coreDesc.holy_core: Channel divine light. Heal yourself and smite enemies.
coreDesc.tech_core: Advanced technology. Multiple projectiles and ricochets.
coreDesc.beast_core: Unleash primal fury. Stack frenzy for massive attack speed.
coreDesc.time_core: Manipulate time itself. Reduce cooldowns and slow enemies.

weaponDesc.arcane_dart: Fast-firing magic darts that seek the nearest enemy
weaponDesc.stone_throw: Heavy stones that arc through the air with gravitational pull
weaponDesc.ice_shard: Crystalline ice that pierces enemies and chills their movement
weaponDesc.ember_bolt: Twin fire bolts that ignite enemies with burning damage
weaponDesc.spectral_arrow: Ghostly arrows that seek out the weakest enemies with high pierce
weaponDesc.scatter_shot: A wide spread of golden pellets covering a large area
weaponDesc.venom_fang: Poison-tipped fangs that stack toxic damage on enemies
weaponDesc.wind_cutter: A swift crescent blade of wind that knocks enemies back
weaponDesc.rusty_blade: A corroded blade with a chance to cause bleeding from tetanus
weaponDesc.monks_fist: Rapid punches in a 3-hit combo. The third hit deals 50% bonus damage
weaponDesc.cleaver: A heavy blade that deals double damage to enemies below 20% health
weaponDesc.whip_lash: A long-range whip that strikes twice - on the way out and back
weaponDesc.battle_axe: A powerful axe with a wide 180-degree swing that hits twice
weaponDesc.claw_strike: Rapid slashing claws that tear enemies and cause bleeding
weaponDesc.poison_puddle: Creates a toxic pool that poisons enemies standing in it
weaponDesc.frost_circle: Creates an icy ring that slows all enemies within
weaponDesc.ember_field: A field of burning embers with rapid tick damage
weaponDesc.shadow_pool: A dark zone that blinds enemies, stopping their movement briefly
weaponDesc.holy_ground: Creates blessed ground that damages enemies and heals the player
weaponDesc.orbiting_stones: Three heavy stones orbit around you, crushing nearby enemies
weaponDesc.spark_chain: Electric sparks that chain between two nearby enemies
weaponDesc.spirit_wisps: Ghostly wisps orbit at varying distances, creating layered protection
weaponDesc.fire_motes: Dancing flames orbit around you, burning enemies on contact
weaponDesc.spike_trap: A basic proximity trap that impales enemies who step on it
weaponDesc.flash_bomb: A blinding explosive that stuns all enemies in its blast
weaponDesc.ice_bomb: An icy explosive that freezes enemies solid on detonation
weaponDesc.light_ray: A focused beam of light that pierces through enemies
weaponDesc.shadow_beam: A dark beam that terrifies enemies, briefly slowing them
weaponDesc.skeleton_minion: Summons a basic skeleton warrior that fights for you
weaponDesc.fire_sprite: Summons a floating flame that shoots fireballs at enemies
weaponDesc.bifrost_bolt: Fires twin bolts of fire and ice that apply burn and slow
weaponDesc.homing_missile: Launches heat-seeking missiles that track enemies relentlessly
weaponDesc.ricochet_shot: A silver orb that bounces between enemies, gaining speed with each hit
weaponDesc.split_arrow: An arrow that shatters into 3 fragments on impact, each seeking new targets
weaponDesc.plasma_orb: A pulsing energy sphere that grows larger and stronger with each enemy pierced
weaponDesc.chakram: A golden spinning ring that returns to you, dealing extra damage on the way back
weaponDesc.void_bullet: A dark bullet that pulls enemies inward before exploding
weaponDesc.crystal_lance: A crystalline spear that shatters into 8 fragments at maximum range
weaponDesc.phantom_blade: A ghostly sword that creates 2 afterimage swings at 50% damage
weaponDesc.flame_scythe: A burning scythe that leaves a trail of fire with each wide sweep
weaponDesc.thunder_hammer: A mighty hammer that releases a stunning shockwave on impact
weaponDesc.blood_razor: A vampiric blade that steals life. Deals more damage when you are wounded
weaponDesc.crescent_moon: Each swing launches a silver crescent projectile that cuts through enemies
weaponDesc.toxic_spores: A poison cloud that spawns new clouds when enemies die inside it
weaponDesc.gravity_well: Creates a vortex that pulls enemies to its center, crushing them together
weaponDesc.hallowed_ring: A holy ring that damages enemies and heals the player standing within
weaponDesc.meteor_crater: Calls down a meteor that creates a burning crater on impact
weaponDesc.blizzard_zone: A freezing storm that stacks slow. At 3 stacks, enemies freeze solid
weaponDesc.soul_orbit: Ethereal souls orbit you, gaining +1 soul per kill (max +4 bonus)
weaponDesc.arc_lightning: Lightning chains between 5 enemies, each jump adding stacking stun
weaponDesc.blade_vortex: Spinning blades orbit you, with the orbit expanding on kills
weaponDesc.toxic_chain: Poison jumps between enemies, each chain adding another poison stack
weaponDesc.flame_dancers: Dual rings of fire orbit in opposite directions, burning all they touch
weaponDesc.cluster_mine: A mine that splits into 4 smaller explosions on detonation
weaponDesc.magnetic_mine: A mine that constantly pulls nearby enemies toward it before exploding
weaponDesc.chain_reaction_mine: When one mine detonates, it triggers all nearby mines in a chain reaction
weaponDesc.prismatic_ray: A rainbow beam that cycles colors, each color applying a different effect
weaponDesc.piercing_gaze: A focused beam that locks onto a target, damage ramping up to 3x over time
weaponDesc.shadow_clone: Summons a dark copy of yourself that uses your weapons at 40% damage
weaponDesc.frost_elemental: An ice golem with a slow aura that explodes into a freeze nova on death
weaponDesc.ragnarok: The blade that ends worlds. Every 50 kills triggers Twilight of the Gods
weaponDesc.cosmic_annihilator: A sweeping beam of galactic destruction. Creates persistent stars
weaponDesc.world_serpent: Jormungandr incarnate. A massive 20-segment serpent that devours the world
weaponDesc.infinity_gauntlet: Collect all 6 Infinity Stones. With all stones... SNAP
weaponDesc.chrono_shatter: Records 10 seconds of attacks, then replays 5 ghost layers simultaneously
weaponDesc.void_emperor: A living void that follows you, growing larger with each soul consumed
weaponDesc.heavens_wrath: Divine lightning with NO damage decay. Chains split and branch
weaponDesc.soul_nexus: A vortex that collects enemy souls. At 100 souls, unleash a Soul Storm
weaponDesc.apocalypse_engine: Mines cycle through the 4 Horsemen. Deploy 10 mines to trigger THE APOCALYPSE
weaponDesc.genesis_blade: The blade of creation. Kills spawn random weapons. Absorb weapons for power
weaponDesc.arcane_cannon: Powerful arcane projectiles that blast through enemy lines
weaponDesc.death_ray: Continuous laser beam that melts through all enemies in its path
weaponDesc.blade_storm: Whirling blades that slice all enemies in a full circle
weaponDesc.toxic_inferno: Burning poison zones that devastate enemies over time
weaponDesc.storm_blades: Orbiting blades that create a protective barrier around you
weaponDesc.spread_seeker: Wide spray of projectiles that covers a large area
weaponDesc.blood_cleaver: Heavy cleaving strikes that cause enemies to bleed
weaponDesc.blazing_bolt: Fiery projectiles that explode on impact for area damage
weaponDesc.frozen_burst: Ice projectiles that shatter into damaging fragments
weaponDesc.phantom_volley: Ghostly arrows that pierce through multiple enemies
weaponDesc.storm_scatter: Rapid spread of projectiles that blanket the battlefield
weaponDesc.venomous_surge: Poison pools that spread deadly toxins to nearby enemies
weaponDesc.primal_strike: Rapid feral attacks that strike multiple times per swing
weaponDesc.berserker_blade: Massive sweeping swings with devastating wide arcs
weaponDesc.lightning_lash: Electric melee strikes that chain lightning to nearby foes
weaponDesc.mystic_arrow: Enchanted arrows that home in on their targets
weaponDesc.umbral_wave: Shadow pulses that radiate outward in dark waves
weaponDesc.radiant_ground: Holy ground that damages enemies and heals allies
weaponDesc.explosive_trap: Deployed traps that detonate with massive explosions
weaponDesc.rock_storm: Orbiting boulders that crush enemies on contact
weaponDesc.undead_legion: Summons an army of skeleton warriors to fight for you
weaponDesc.elemental_clash: Alternating fire and ice zones that burn and freeze enemies
weaponDesc.inferno_swarm: Fire sprites that swarm enemies and ignite them
weaponDesc.arcane_scatter: Piercing arcane bolts that spread in a wide fan
weaponDesc.constellation_arrow: Arrows leave a trail of damaging stars connected by ethereal lines
weaponDesc.singularity_orb: Creates a miniature black hole that pulls enemies in before imploding
weaponDesc.phoenix_feather: A mystical feather that can respawn twice, spreading cleansing fire
weaponDesc.temporal_bolt: A bolt of pure chronal energy that slows time in its wake
weaponDesc.dragonbreath_volley: Builds heat with each shot. Overcharge unleashes a 2x damage burst
weaponDesc.void_reaver: Each kill tears open a void rift. Damage stacks permanently
weaponDesc.aurora_field: A mesmerizing aurora cycling through fire, ice, lightning, and nature
weaponDesc.dimensional_rift: Creates two linked portals. Enemies entering one are expelled from the other
weaponDesc.celestial_orbit: Sun, Moon, and Stars orbit you with unique powers
weaponDesc.mirrorblade: Two mirror images swing from opposite directions, creating crossfire
weaponDesc.cascade_lightning: Lightning that grows stronger with each jump, can branch into arcs
weaponDesc.moonlight_slash: Three silver crescents dance through enemies with waxing power
weaponDesc.orbital_bombardment: Meteors orbit you in the sky. Command them to strike down
weaponDesc.supernova_core: A collapsing star that pulls enemies inward before a cataclysmic explosion
weaponDesc.void_anchor: Chains enemies to the void. Roots, pulls, detonates, then leaves a rift
weaponDesc.quantum_mine: Exists in quantum superposition - 3 locations simultaneously
weaponDesc.soulrender: Rends souls from slain enemies. Captured souls seek new victims
weaponDesc.sunbeam: A beam of concentrated sunlight that intensifies over time
weaponDesc.phoenix_guardian: A majestic phoenix companion. Burns enemies and is reborn in fire
weaponDesc.storm_caller: Each swing builds storm charge. At full charge, unleash a lightning storm
weaponDesc.inferno_bolt: Blazing projectiles that burn enemies and explode on kill
weaponDesc.frost_shard: Icy projectiles that slow and freeze enemies, shattering on kill
weaponDesc.thunder_strike: Lightning that chains between enemies with a chance to stun
weaponDesc.shadow_blade: Swift melee strikes with high critical chance and execute damage
weaponDesc.blood_scythe: Sweeping scythe that drains life and causes bleeding wounds
weaponDesc.arcane_barrage: Rapid arcane bolts that reduce all weapon cooldowns
weaponDesc.venom_spore: Poison clouds that damage over time while regenerating the player
weaponDesc.steel_hammer: Powerful manual strikes that pierce armor and send enemies flying
weaponDesc.earth_spike: Ground eruptions that deal area damage and stun nearby enemies
weaponDesc.void_rift: Dark rifts that pull enemies in and amplify damage taken
weaponDesc.holy_lance: Divine laser beam that pierces all enemies, healing you and smiting foes
weaponDesc.tech_turret: Rapid-fire projectiles that ricochet between multiple targets
weaponDesc.beast_claw: Savage claw attacks that cause bleeding and build frenzy on kills
weaponDesc.chrono_beam: Time-warping laser that slows enemies and reduces cooldowns
weaponDesc.wind_cutter_core: Slicing wind blades that knock back enemies and boost movement speed
weaponDesc.crimson_reaper: Heals for a portion of damage dealt
weaponDesc.feral_strike: Killing enemies increases attack speed temporarily
weaponDesc.temporal_ray: Enemies hit take increasing damage over time
weaponDesc.arcane_tempest: Marked enemies explode when mark expires
weaponDesc.blizzard_lance: Frozen enemies shatter on kill, damaging nearby
weaponDesc.dimension_rend: Enemies in rift take increasing damage over time
weaponDesc.hurricane_slash: Creates mini cyclones that pull enemies
weaponDesc.nightmare_slash: Creates shadow afterimages that deal damage
weaponDesc.phoenix_storm: Explosions can chain to nearby enemies
weaponDesc.seraph_judgment: Marked enemies take bonus holy damage on kill
weaponDesc.soul_harvester: Killing bleeding enemies grants temporary damage boost
weaponDesc.tectonic_surge: Creates temporary stone shields on spike locations
weaponDesc.tempest_fury: Shocked enemies take bonus damage from all sources
weaponDesc.time_distortion: Enemies hit may be frozen in time
weaponDesc.titan_maul: Deals bonus damage to stunned enemies
weaponDesc.adamantine_breaker: Every 5th hit creates a massive ground slam
weaponDesc.beast_king: Periodically roars, fearing enemies and boosting damage
weaponDesc.blazing_apocalypse: Releases a fire nova every 30 kills
weaponDesc.chrono_master: Periodically rewinds cooldowns for all weapons
weaponDesc.lightning_god: Random lightning strikes hit enemies every few seconds
weaponDesc.reality_collapse: Rifts explode on expiry, dealing massive damage
weaponDesc.reality_shatter: Periodically opens rifts that deal massive damage
weaponDesc.storm_emperor: Periodically summons a tornado at target location
weaponDesc.void_assassin: Marks enemies, executing them when below 20% HP
weaponDesc.continental_drift: Permanent aura that increases armor and damages enemies
weaponDesc.cosmic_weave: Permanent arcane field that amplifies all damage
weaponDesc.eternal_bloodlust: Permanent aura that drains life and causes bleeding
weaponDesc.eternal_winter: Enemies near player are slowed and take frost damage
weaponDesc.eternity_weaver: Permanent aura that slows enemies and speeds player
weaponDesc.god_light: Permanent aura that heals and damages enemies
weaponDesc.mjolnir: Hammer infused with lightning, creates thunder on hit
weaponDesc.oblivion_blade: Permanent shadow aura that damages and weakens enemies
weaponDesc.omega_protocol: Creates a protective field and orbital drones
weaponDesc.primordial_wind: Permanent wind aura that increases speed and damages enemies
weaponDesc.primal_god: Permanent beastly aura with multiple attack bonuses
weaponDesc.thor_judgment: Enemies near player periodically take lightning damage
weaponDesc.void_god: Permanent void aura that damages and weakens enemies
weaponDesc.world_tree: Permanent aura that poisons enemies and heals player

rogue.name: Rogue
rogue.description: Fast and lucky with critical strikes

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Take 15% less damage from all sources
